htmlText.featureText: In this experiment you will be shown a number of words. Some words are true English words and some are made-up non-words. If you know the word click the button 'Yes, I know the word'. If you do not know the word click the button 'No, I do not know the word'. 'Know' includes having heard or read the word before and having some idea of its meaning.

targetButton.featureText: Well done. Now the second round will start. Click on the button to continue. Good luck!
Well done. Now the second round will start. Click on the button to continue. Good luck!

htmlText.featureText: This is the end of this task. Thank you for you participation!
This is the end of this task.

During this experiment you will be presented with a spoken word and four numbered pictures. Press the SPACE bar to hear the word. Then press the number on the keyboard corresponding to the image associated with the word.

Speed is not important.

Good luck!

plainText.featureText: Cannot connect to the server, please check your internet connection and/or upload data later. Do not clean the browser's cache.
